name: Fit the Fat: Idle Gym
description:
It's time to get fit, once again! This time you are responsible to build the gym....

Earn money as each character use the gym. As you keep on progressing, the characters will get fit!

Features:
- Upgrade your Gym by increasing the ticket price.
- Upgrade your Gym by adding more activities and exercises.
- Upgrade the time they take to do the activities.

Earn money, build the biggest gym and see how they lose weight!
Have fun :)
